content:
FilterUserControlBase Class

In this Article

Provides the base class for user controls that are used to filter data in a data table. This class is used to display filter selectors.

Syntax

Declaration

public class FilterUserControlBase : System.Web.UI.UserControl, System.Web.DynamicData.IControlParameterTarget

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Control
  • TemplateControl
  • System.Web.UI.UserControl
  • FilterUserControlBase

Constructors summary

FilterUserControlBase()

Initializes a new instance of the FilterUserControlBase class.

Properties summary

Column

Gets the column a filter applies to.
ContextTypeName

Gets or sets the type of context that a table or data column is part of.
DataField

Gets or sets the name of the column to filter.
InitialValue

Gets the initial value of the filter when the filter is populated.
SelectedDataKey

Gets the data key for the selected item.
SelectedValue

Gets the selected value in a drop-down list box control.
TableName

Gets or sets the name of the data table that is used by the filter.

Methods summary

PopulateListControl(ListControl)

Populates a ListControl object with all the items in a data table that are related to the current table through a foreign key.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IControlParameterTarget.FilteredColumn

Gets the data column that is filtered.
IControlParameterTarget.GetPropertyNameExpression(String)

Gets the name of the column that is filtered.
IControlParameterTarget.Table

Gets the table that is filtered.

Constructors

  • FilterUserControlBase()

    Initializes a new instance of the FilterUserControlBase class.

    public FilterUserControlBase ();

Properties

  • Column

    Gets the column a filter applies to.

    public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn Column { get; }

    Property Value

    • MetaColumn

      The column a filter applies to.

  • ContextTypeName

    Gets or sets the type of context that a table or data column is part of.

    public string ContextTypeName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the data source object to use to retrieve the data.

  • DataField

    Gets or sets the name of the column to filter.

    public string DataField { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the column to filter.

  • InitialValue

    Gets the initial value of the filter when the filter is populated.

    public string InitialValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The initial value of the filter.

  • SelectedDataKey

    Gets the data key for the selected item.

    public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey SelectedDataKey { get; }

    Property Value

    • DataKey

      The key of the selected item.

  • SelectedValue

    Gets the selected value in a drop-down list box control.

    public virtual string SelectedValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The currently selected value in a drop-down list box control.

    Remarks

    By default, filter selectors are displayed in a DropDownList control.

  • TableName

    Gets or sets the name of the data table that is used by the filter.

    public string TableName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the data table that is used by the filter.

Methods

  • PopulateListControl(ListControl)

    Populates a ListControl object with all the items in a data table that are related to the current table through a foreign key.

    public void PopulateListControl (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl listControl);

    Parameters

    • listControl
      ListControl

      The control to populate.

    Remarks

    By default, filter selectors are displayed in a DropDownList control.

    Gets the data column that is filtered.

    Returns

    • MetaColumn

      The data column that is filtered.

    Gets the name of the column that is filtered.

    string IControlParameterTarget.GetPropertyNameExpression (string columnName);

    Parameters

    • columnName
      String

      The column that is filtered.

    Returns

    • String

      The column that is filtered.

    Gets the table that is filtered.

    System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable System.Web.DynamicData.IControlParameterTarget.Table { get; }

    Returns

    • MetaTable

      The table that was filtered.
